item.title: Apex Legends World Championship 2025: Tournament Preview
item.description: Complete preview of the Apex Legends Global Series Championship 2025 with teams, format, and predictions.

item.title: PUBG: Global Championship 2025 Announced
item.description: Krafton reveals details for PUBG Global Championship 2025 with record prize pool.

item.title: League of Legends Worlds 2025: T1 Wins Fourth Championship
item.description: Faker and T1 dominate the finals 3-0 against JDG, securing their fourth World Championship title in an incredible display of skill.

item.title: VCT 2025 Champions: New Era of Competition
item.description: Valorant Champions Tour 2025 introduces new format with $25 million prize pool and revolutionary broadcast features.
